full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Destination Management System
***

The Government of Canada invites qualified contractors to participate in a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the implementation of a comprehensive destination management system (DMS).

## Tender Information

| Requirement | Value/Info |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | CB-8025-55298242 |
| **Request Number** | DC-2023-PO-02 |
| **Publication Date** | August 9, 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | September 6, 2023, 5:00 PM EDT |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | December 1, 2023 |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | November 30, 2028 |

## Opportunity

The purpose of this Request for Proposal is to establish a comprehensive destination management system (DMS) capable of addressing the diverse needs of Destination Canada and its stakeholders. 

## Requirements

This RFP invites eligible contractors to submit proposals for a comprehensive destination management system (DMS) solution. The proposed system will need to meet the detailed requirements outlined in the Statement of Work, as stated in the RFP document.

## Evaluation and Selection

Proposals will be evaluated based on the combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Eligibility Criteria

All qualified contractors are invited to participate. Interested contractors must submit their proposals in accordance with the instructions provided in the RFP document.

## Additional Information

* Trade Agreements: Please refer to the RFP document.
* Preferred Language: English
* Regions of Opportunity: Worldwide
* Regions of Delivery: Canada
* Contact Information: 
  - Name: Paulina Orozco 
  - Email: procurement@destinationcanada.com 
  - Phone: (604) 638-8372

## Document Availability

All tender documents are available on the Government of Canada's procurement website.

* Emphasized key points and requirements with bold text
* Removed unnecessary information
* Improved formatting for a more polished appearance
* Preserved all original information, only rephrasing for clarity and concision
